item.title: Kavitha backed candidates win Waddepalli civic poll
item.description:
<![CDATA[TELANGANA: All India Forward Bloc candidates backed by Kalvakuntla Kavitha have taken control of Waddepalli Municipality after winning eight of ten wards in Gadwal district.
Kavitha had earlier announced that candidates associated with her organisation, Jagriti, would contest on the AIFB symbol. The results confirmed that strategy, with AIFB nominees securing a clear majority.
Of the remaining two wards, one was won by the Congress and the other by the Bharat Rashtra Samithi.
With eight seats...]]>
item.author: Roopa Nagesh
